comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: ImperialSMM on July 02, 2022, 08:33:46 AM*** Cheapest & Highest Quality Services  ( Automated Delivery, Instant Speed, High Quality, Cheapest ) ****** New and cheaper services added ***For more details, visit our website!Yes, we also accept PayPal & RevolutLink : https://imperialsmm.com/We offer a Massive Verity of Services.Promotion*** Promotion Category  - Instagram Followers Service ID 764 ( 0.64$ per 1K ) No DROP ****** Promotion Category - Facebook Page Like Service ID 925 ( 1.82$ per 1K <- BEST ON THE MARKET ) ***You are promoting social media pages/profiles to increase likes, followers, comment  etc. I have visited and surprised to see that though you are providing social media profiles/pages/posts yet you have no social media profiles/pages of you. Which seems to me that either you are not able to provide the service or you are providing fake service.
